results.title: Work simplification applied to clerical operations
results.creator_credit: Kinocrat Films and W H Smith and Son
results.brief_description: How a series of typical clerical operations in an office were simplified and speeded up by watching for unnecessary strain and discomfort, and for unduly ponderous or inefficient processes, and eliminating them.

results.title: Work out
results.brief_description: The film dramatises how two persons who are concerned with the same values may differ quite fundamentally in their understanding of them. The film considers freedom as related to security and to change, to morality and to obedience. The immediate incident on which the structure of this film rests is simple: a father’s visit to his son at College. However, the emotions which motivate the visit are complex, emotions which have been dormant and which burst into action when the father discovers that his son has been participating in campus demonstrations.

results.title: Work of the Stock Exchange
results.brief_description: Mass production is basic to the standard of living in the United States but labour, money and management must be brought together before goods can be produced in quantity. The film goes on to explain how businesses are able to expand and raise capital by listing their securities on the Stock Exchange; the measures adopted to safeguard buyers and sellers of a company’s securities before listing on the Stock Exchange; how transactions are made on the Stock Exchange and how the investor is paid for the sale of their securities. Includes footage of the Stock Exchange.

results.title: Work of the heart
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Charles L. Finance
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the structure and function of the heart. Shows operation procedures to correct certain cardio vascular defects and mentions heart transplants. Includes a view of the mitral valves in living heart.

results.title: Work of the blood [Colour]
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Hal Kopel
results.brief_description: The laboratory analysis of a blood sample reveals the structure of cells and the composition of plasma. Demonstrates the function of the blood, methods of analysing blood types and the giving of transfusions.

results.title: Work it out (Captioned)
results.brief_description: A video, aimed at young women between the ages of 14-20 years, that examines career opportunities available. The subject areas covered include : Women at Work; Careers Counselling; Equal Opportunity; Personal Development; Industrial relations; Social Studies.

results.title: Work it out
results.brief_description: Work It Out provides attractive and undaunting options for young women through the real life experiences of a group of eleven women. The women interviewed are quiet achievers with whom young women can readily identify.
